About.3: I am a student at ETNA and I am currently looking for a work placement.  I am more comfortable with web development but I am open to new experiences.

Background_1.4: During my high school years, I was able to study python during my math classes as well as C during my engineering science classes. At the end of these years, I obtained my high school diploma with honors.

Background_2.4: During my years of computer science degree, I was able to improve my skills in algorithmic. I studied Java and the basics of web development.

Background_3.4: I chose to leave my former university for ETNA because of the pedagogy which was not focused on practice, which is the opposite of ETNA.

Project_1.2: Creation of a mini-RPG with turn-based battles. The project was done in pairs in 4 days. We were able to implement several features like an inventory, magic, different playable characters, classes and races for each character...

Project_2.2: Creation of an e-commerce website with React, the majority of the functionalities that can be found on a on a classic online store are present. (shopping cart, login and registration system connection and registration system, filtering of products according to their category...)

Project_3.2: Creation of an API with all the basic functionalities (routes, controllers...). Use of Sequelize to model the database.

Project_4.2: Creation of a tool facilitating the follow-up of the students for the pedagogical team of ETNA. Our project was mainly to facilitate the follow-up by promotion as well as the taking of individual appointments for students. Use of MongoDB and ExpressJS for the back-end. The front-end was realized with React and the NextJS framework.
